title: Senior Software Engineer - Team Lead
details: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer with strong technical skills and experience leading development teams. This role combines hands-on coding with team leadership and client interaction, requiring both technical excellence and soft skills.
requirements: Solid understanding of CloudFormation and Terraform
Expertise in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Experience with microservices and distributed systems
responsibilities: Lead technical design and architecture decisions
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Collaborate with clients on technical requirements
Drive technical best practices and standards
Participate in client presentations and technical discussions
legalStatus: H1B sponsorship available, open to visa holders
